name: Montserrat And Cava Tour
description:
VISIT THE MONTSERRAT MOUNTAIN AND TASTE THE CATALAN CAVA

The Montserrat and Cava Tour from Barcelona combines a visit to the beautiful Montserrat mountain in west Barcelona and the Freixenet Company, the biggest producer of champagne (in Spanish: Cava) in the world.

Over the years Montserrat has been the goal not only for thousands of pilgrims, but also for architects like Antoni Gaudí and Jean Nouvel, who have been inspired by the unique forms of the rocks and by the beautiful natural park on the mountain.
